meanings.definition: (adjective) Most stylish or fashionable in a sporty way.
meanings.sent1: She wore the sportiest outfit to the game.
meanings.sent2: The team captain always chooses the sportiest uniforms.
meanings.sent3: Even the dog looked sportiest in its little jersey.
meanings.sent4: Her car was the sportiest on the road, zooming past others effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The sportiest sneakers made him feel like a champion on the track.

meanings.definition: (adverb) In a manner that is the most stylish or fashionable in a sporty way.
meanings.sent1: She ran sportiest during the race, leaving her competitors behind.
meanings.sent2: The athlete moved sportiest across the field, showcasing his agility.
meanings.sent3: He danced sportiest at the party, impressing everyone with his moves.
meanings.sent4: The car sped sportiest around the track, thrilling the spectators.
meanings.sent5: The music played sportiest at the concert, energizing the crowd.
